longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for nationals
of Mongolia.
Visa Issuance:
- Holders of an official invitation letter issued by the State
  Migration Service of Azerbaijan (or other Azerbaijan
  government authority) can obtain a visa on arrival.
- Staff of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and their
  dependents can obtain a visa on arrival if holding an
  official invitation letter from the ADB
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, from June to October in lowland areas. There is no
  malaria transmission in Baku. Recommended prevention in risk
  areas: A.
